welcome.title: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, welcome!
welcome.description: I'm Guillermo, a person who loves technology and is constantly looking to create software that improves the lives of as many people as possible. I specialize in creating software for clients ranging from individuals and small businesses to large enterprise corporations. I have developed specific products that solve the business needs of my clients. I have worked in software development, front-end/back-end web, ux/ui and database management. I have a passionate spirit that along with my natural problem solving skills help me to achieve my dreams and desires. I am never satisfied with just dreaming, but have an innate need to make them come true by acting accordingly step by step. I have a very good ability to learn and acquire new skills. You can read more details about my biography, experiences, skills and studies

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've build or been a part of.

jobs.title: Head of Development
jobs.period: Jul 2023 - Present | Head of Development since Feb. 2025
jobs.description:
I lead the Development Department, being responsible for the maintenance, continuous improvement, and development of new features for the company's SaaS platform in production, designed for small and medium-sized businesses. The system includes an administrative panel, point-of-sale solutions (web and mobile app), payment integrations, electronic invoicing (Paraguay), and e-commerce capabilities. I oversee the team's technical leadership, architectural design, and ensure system quality, performance, and scalability. In addition, I develop and maintain FACSIS, a production-grade electronic invoicing application aimed at mass adoption in Paraguay, built as a Web App using Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, and compiled with Capacitor.
Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Node.js, Jetstream, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, CSS, SASS, Tailwind, Bootstrap, HTML5, Git, GitHub, Capacitor.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Development and maintenance of digital billing systems and integration with external systems via Api, DB and Middleware.
Technologies used: Java, SpringBoot, Javascript, Node js, Php, Laravel, PostgreSQL, Mysql, Bootstrap, Css, Html5, Git, Gitlab, Trello, Slack.

jobs.title: Software Engineer

Development and maintenance of e-commerce, admin and call center of the company.
Technologies used: Nuxt Js, Vue js, Angular, Javascript, Php, Laravel, Jetstream, Mysql, Vuetify, Css, Sass, Tailwind, Bootstrap, Html5, Git, Github and Bitbucket.

jobs.title: Freelancer Web Developer
jobs.description:
Software development for small and large companies.
Technologies used: Node js, Java, Vue js, Javascript, Mysql, PostgreSQL, Php, Html5, Css, Sass, Bootstrap.
